metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Greenwood. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Scott B Frye, CEPA®

heroDescription: Greenwood, Indiana, a vibrant suburb of Indianapolis, offers a balanced lifestyle with access to urban amenities.
landscapeDescription: Greenwood's economy is driven by retail, healthcare, and manufacturing sectors. The city benefits from its proximity to Indianapolis, enhancing its economic growth potential.
uniqueNeeds: Greenwood requires tailored financial advice due to its suburban growth and diverse economic landscape.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Greenwood's retail and healthcare sectors face competition from urban centers. Monitor housing market trends to avoid bubble risks. Prepare for potential flooding and diversify investments.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Greenwood's economy has shown steady growth, with a focus on retail and healthcare services driving local employment.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Greenwood is $65,000, reflecting a stable middle-class population.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Greenwood are increasingly specializing in retirement planning and real estate investment.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Greenwood's cost of living remains below the national average, making it an attractive option for families.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Greenwood's real estate market is competitive, with home prices rising steadily due to demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Greenwood's business environment is favorable, supported by local incentives and a growing workforce.
